Message: I am so tired, I feel so sick, can we just stop?

Of course, taking breaks is important for well-being. Let's resume when you're feeling more refreshed. Remember, your health comes first. But I want you to know, the effort you put in so far was commendable. Don't forget to celebrate small victories too.
I am dying, I can't make it.

It's natural to feel overwhelmed at times. Let's pause, regroup, and focus on what you've already achieved. We'll tackle the rest step by step, at a pace that feels right for you. Believe in yourself, even if progress seems slow today. Your determination will carry you
I don't like doing sport, I don't wanna to run.

It's okay to have moments of doubt or dislike an activity. Sports offer a multitude of choices, and finding the right fit takes time. Let's work together to discover what energizes you, and we'll tailor our sessions to suit your preferences. In the meantime, let's appreciate
